item.title: Some cool weblinks
item.description: I force my fav weblinks upon you Cameron’s world - A collage of old internet sites Rauno’s UI portfolio - Especially love the flow project Archive any link - pls also donate to the internet archive Obviously xkcd Bret victor’s ladder of abstraction Andy matuschak’s work Through the looking glass, lewis carroll Youtube links (that exist for now) 2 idiots 1 keyboard I dont care inator Louvre lover A place that language cannot reach Probably the best video on complex adaptive systems A summary of The Historia Naturalis Abridged (Books I-II)
item.content:encoded:
I force my fav weblinks upon you

  1. Cameron’s world - A collage of old internet sites
  2. Rauno’s UI portfolio - Especially love the flow project
  3. Archive any link - pls also donate to the internet archive
  4. Obviously xkcd
  5. Bret victor’s ladder of abstraction
  6. Andy matuschak’s work
  7. Through the looking glass, lewis carroll

Youtube links (that exist for now)

  1. 2 idiots 1 keyboard
  2. I dont care inator
  3. Louvre lover
  4. A place that language cannot reach
  5. Probably the best video on complex adaptive systems
  6. A summary of The Historia Naturalis Abridged (Books I-II)
